Title: Kosuke-sama Rikimaru-sama: Konpeitou no Ryuu
Description: ["Kosukesama Rikimarusama: Konpeito no Ryu was a 45 minute long anime TV special produced by J.C. Staff and broadcast on Japanese television in 1988. Similar to Dragon Ball, it was a martial arts adventure story featuring villains that could have stepped out of the Red Ribbon Army, typical Toriyama mecha, and a clone of Son Gohan's Haiya Dragon.", '\n', '\r\n(Source: animenation.net)']
Voices: ['Matsuoka, Youko', 'Oota, Takako', 'Otsuka, Chikao', 'Koseki, Hajime', 'Oikawa, Hiroo', 'Nishihara, Kumiko']
Staff: [['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', 'Sound Director'], ['Ashida, Toyoo', 'Script, Screenplay, Animation Director'], ['Hagita, Mitsuo', 'Theme Song Arrangement'], ['Toriyama, Akira', 'Character Design']]
